00117 inline void JPEGWriter::setQuality(const unsigned value, const bool forceBaseline) {
00118     assert(value >= 0 && value <= 100);
00119     jpeg_set_quality(&cinfo, value, forceBaseline);
00120 }

00126 template <typename RowPtrIter>
00127 void JPEGWriter::write(const std::string& path, RowPtrIter rows) {
00128     
00129     // Specify the destination for the compressed data (eg, a file)
00130     FILE* file = NULL;
00131     if ((file = fopen(path.c_str(), "wb")) == NULL)
00132         throw std::runtime_error("Cannot open " + path);
00133     
00134         jpeg_stdio_dest(&cinfo, file);
00135     
00136     jpeg_start_compress(&cinfo, true);
00137 
00138         while (cinfo.next_scanline < cinfo.image_height) {
00139         unsigned char* row_ptr = *rows;
00140         jpeg_write_scanlines(&cinfo, &row_ptr, 1);
00141         ++rows;
00142     }
00143     
00144         jpeg_finish_compress(&cinfo);
00145     
00146     fclose(file);
00147 }
